name: The 10th Int’l Conference on Creative Education
content: The 10th Int’l Conference on Creative Education (CCE 2024) will be held during Oct. 25-27, 2024 in Guilin, China. This Conference will cover issues on Creative Education. The aim of CCE 2024 is to provide a stage for researchers, engineers, academicians as well as industrial professionals from all over the world to present their latest research results and advanced research methods.
